pages.text:
Events
Events
The Cove Cay Golf Club allows for many options when it comes planning and playing host to your event.  Our 18-hole championship length course offers challenging holes with extensive water views of Old Tampa Bay. We offer outside venues perfect for ceremonies, receptions, private parties, etc.  Our Garden View Banquet Room offers a water view of Cove Cay Golf Course, as well as Old Tampa Bay, and accommodates up to 120 guests for dinner or 250 guests for a cocktail reception.  The recently renovated
Bayview Grill
serves daily food and drink specials along with a full menu.  Let us know how we can help make your event one to remember!
The Cove Cay Golf Club Can Host
Corporate Golf Clinics
Charity Golf Tournaments
Our Clubhouse Lobby
Weddings Receptions
Private Parties
Destination Weddings
Company Golf Tournaments
Charity Golf Tournaments
Business Meetings
Weddings & Receptions
Civic Meetings
Corporate Outings
Birthday & Anniversary Parties
Retirement Parties

PGA Junior League Team
PGA Junior League Team
The Cove Cay PGA Junior League Team, also know as the “Cove Cay All-Stars”, recruits members for the upcoming season in March of each year and welcomes boys and girls ages 13 and under, and boys and girls ages 14-17 to join the fun. The Cove Cay All Stars are a part of a local league and compete against other teams in both Pinellas and Hillsborough County.
Practices begin in mid-late May and then Matches begin in June. The Cove Cay PGA Junior League team competes here at home as well as other Tampa Bay area golf courses. This is a great opportunity for junior golfers to make new friends, improve their golf skills, and learn course etiquette as well as tournament etiquette.
REGISTRATION IS NOW OPEN FOR 2025!
Click
HERE
for more details and to register. There is a limited number of spaces available, so please register ASAP.
Practices and matches will start mid to late may.
Practices will be held on Thursday evenings.
Matches will be held on Saturday afternoon/evenings.

Bayview Grill
Bayview Grill
The Bayview Grill restaurant at Cove Cay Golf Club is open to the public 7 days a week with great food and views. Indoor and patio seating is available and we’re open for  lunch and dinner. Even non-golfers enjoy the views of our golf course and Old Tampa Bay while dining at Cove Cay. Our Chef is incredible and has created daily dinner specials in addition to our daily menu that offers something for each and every customer, including vegetarians and pescatarians.
Full Bayview Menu
Open Saturday 11 am to 6 pm
Open Sunday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Friday 11 am to 8 pm
Open Monday and Thursday 11 am to 8:30 pm
All are Welcome
Full Bar
Daily Specials
Planning a wedding, special event or business meeting? Cove Cay Golf Club is a popular venue for events because of our easy and free parking, spacious clubhouse with private banquet room, and full bar and restaurant. We also have mens and women’s locker rooms complete with dressing areas and showers. If interested in taking a tour or planning an event, call 727-535-1949 ext 4 to speak with Deanna.

Contact Us

Call Us
Golf Shop:
727-535-1406
Main:
727-536-1949

Email Us
Golf, Restaurant, and Event Questions
Deanna.Brockway@covecaygolf.com

Find Us
2612 Cove Cay Drive,
Clearwater, FL 33760
Begin Constant Contact Inline Form Code
End Constant Contact Inline Form Code
Bill Shriver
PGA Class A Professional, Owner/Director of Golf
bill@covecaygolf.com
Pat Shriver
PGA Class A Teaching Pro, Owner/General Manager
pat@covecaygolf.com
Deanna Brockaway
Office Manager
deanna.brockway@covecaygolf.com

Corporate Golf Events
Corporate Golf Events
Let Cove Cay Golf Club customize a corporate golf outing or group clinic for your team members or clients! Golf provides a fun way to team build or network, and a customized golf outing or clinic can be a creative way to say “thank you” to clients or staff.  The Cove Cay Golf Club can customize events of any size and can provide a fun, non-threatening environment for golf newbies and advanced players alike. Our group golf lessons and clinics are a great way for participants to either learn the game of golf, or simply hone their golf skills.
We can customize anything from a 2-hour short game clinic for 12 people that includes breakfast or lunch, to a half-day of short game and driver instruction for 50 followed by a dinner. We can also arrange an inter-office golf tournament followed by a lunch or dinner.
Our pros deliver an excellent experience, no matter the event, and our restaurant staff will prepare and serve a wonderful meal when requested. We  promise a great time for all!
In addition, all corporate events are customized to each specific client’s wants and needs.  If you’re interesting, contact
Pat Shriver
for more information.
Naturalslim
We recently hosted a corporate outing for 100 associates and family members from

About Us
About Us
Cove Cay Golf Club is a top golf course in Tampa Bay. We’re known for challenging golf, gorgeous views, and incredible wildlife. We are a semi-public course with full practice facility and on property you’ll find a Clubhouse with men’s and women’s locker rooms, bar and restaurant with indoor and outdoor seating, and a Golf Shop with a wide variety of men’s and women’s golf apparel, golf gear, and more.
Together, Bill and Pat Shriver have tackled the enormous task of returning the Cove Cay Golf Course and the Bayview Restaurant to the gem it once was decades ago. Many golfers as well as Club Members have enjoyed the upgrades to the course and Clubhouse,
Golf Shop
and
Bayview Grill
over the years- and the improvements are ongoing. If you haven’t played at Cove Cay Golf Club in a while we hope you’ll stop by soon to play, dine, or meet the owners.
Pat Shriver is a PGA Pro and Cove Cay Golf Club Co-owner as well as Shriver Golf Academy Instructor. Pat has been a PGA Class A Golf Professional since 1995 and has been named Teacher Of The Year by the
PGA North Florida
and the North Florida West Central Chapter on numerous occasions.  She’s also competed in golf her entire life including junior golf, high school and college golf, then Futures Tour Golf and currently the North Florida PGA Section tournament golf.  Yet with all of her accomplishments, Pat is most proud of the successes her students have had playing golf over the years.  She’s coached many junior golfers to college golf, and one all the way to the LPGA tour. Because she has a lifetime relationship with her students she’s now coaching second generations of families and says, “It’s the consistency that wins golf tournaments.  It’s been so rewarding to see families play golf together and enjoy the game, and just as rewarding to see my students grow up playing golf and winning tournaments.
Bill Shriver is aPGA Pro, Cove Cay Golf Club Co-owner, as well as Shriver Golf Academy Instructor. Bill has been a PGA member since 1994.  He started playing golf with his father when he was a child, then he went on to play golf for West Virginia University before graduating and becoming a golf professional.  He worked in West Virginia as an Assistant Golf Professional for 6 years, then as a Head Golf Professional for 8 years.  Bill wore many hats, during his time there, doing everything from cart maintenance to shoe shining to merchandising to tournaments, so it’s fair to say he’s a pro at all aspects of golf, the game as well as the business.  Bill left his home state to move to Florida to work for the Wally Armstrong Golf Academy.  From there he worked at the Diamondback Golf Club, and the Ken Venturi Golf Academy before becoming the Director of Instruction at the Shriver Golf Academy, which he owns and operates with his partner in life and business, Pat McClanan- Shriver.
Cove Cay Golf Club is a family owned and operated golf course welcoming golfers of all skill levels and is open to the public. For a tee time, call 727-535-1949 ext 1 or Click
HERE
to book online.

Memberships
Club Memberships
We are now
accepting new seasonal members.
We have limited capacity and returning Seasonal Members will get priority. We offer both
golf and social club memberships
at Cove Cay, and membership has its privileges!
For golf lovers, the member cart fee is only $22.47 including tax for 18 holes and $12.84 including tax for 9 holes. Members also receive
preferred Advance Tee Times and unlimited Range Balls.
Bag and Cart storage is available and details are on the membership application form.
We have several
men’s and ladies golf leagues that play at Cove Cay year-round, and we have golf and non-golfing special events and activities all year long. There is a minimum of 4 Months Membership Required To Join.
